sentence: 1. **What do you call a cow who has just had an abortion? de-calf-inated**
- This joke plays on the word calf, which can mean both a young bovine (first meaning) and to remove the calves from a cow (the jokes pun).
2. **Did you hear about the cheese factory that exploded in France? there was nothing left but de brie.**
- The word brie, referring to a type of cheese (first meaning), can also humorously refer to debris (the jokes pun).
